text: Reprogramming of a diagnostic instance must be possible independently from the actual clamp-state (ISW_STAT).
If the reprogramming-attempt is aborted (e.g. lost of connection to tester), the diagnostic instance must detect the abortion.
supplier_comment:
2023-06-22 Rogge, Vinay:
When reprogramming is aborted, bootloader will detect it and control will stay in boot mode.

text: If an abortion is detected the diagnostic instance must immediately be ready to be reprogrammed again without any special investigation (like clamp30-reset).
If clamp30 is lost while reprogramming of the diagnostic instance, the diagnostic instance must be reprogrammable without any special investigation if clamp 30 is available again.
supplier_comment:
2023-07-04 Rogge, Vinay:
 Acutal clamp state is not applicable but Network message is considered instead to keep IMU running.
